alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:34AM EST until January 17 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow or mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Worcester MA and Northern Middlesex MA Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible, especially across the northern Worcester Hills. Localized blowing snow could also lead to reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
